RevisionEvent.Note: Initial release of metadata, ADAPT generated, LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: Aeronomy of Ice in the Mesosphere (AIM), Cloud Imaging and Particle Size (CIPS) Polar Mesospheric Clouds (PMC) Albedo images. There are 15 orbits per day and the data are gridded to form the Level 3A images
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator for use of the Data

InformationURL.Name: Data Management Plan
InformationURL.Description: Aeronomy of Ice in the Mesosphere (AIM)

InformationURL.Name: data files and canned plots (under north & south level_3a directories)

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator . Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these Data.

Parameter.Name: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Caveats: * Computed CDF_Epoch value: from yyyymmdd to Epoch This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_AIM_EPOCH with the following input parameters: UT_DATE.

Parameter.Name: Albedo (DAILY DATA) North&South
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Caveats: Reported albedo is a ratio of observed cloud albedo normalized by earth's albedo.

Parameter.Name: Albedo
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Thumbnail and large mapped images Northern hemisphere [select dates when the s/c is in the north (May-Sept.)]
Parameter.Caveats: * Reported albedo is a ratio of observed cloud albedo normalized by earth's albedo. This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_FILTER_FLAG with the following input parameters: ALBEDO, HEMISPHERE.

Parameter.Name: Albedo
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: ---> Movie of Northern hemisphere mapped images [select dates when the s/c is in the north (May-Sept.)]
Parameter.Caveats: * Reported albedo is a ratio of observed cloud albedo normalized by earth's albedo. This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_FILTER_FLAG with the following input parameters: ALBEDO, HEMISPHERE.

Parameter.Name: Albedo
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Thumbnail/large mapped images of Southern hemisphere [select dates when the s/c is in the south (Nov.- Feb.)]
Parameter.Caveats: * Reported albedo is a ratio of observed cloud albedo normalized by earth's albedo. This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_FILTER_FLAG with the following input parameters: ALBEDO, HEMISPHERE.

Parameter.Name: Albedo
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: ---> Movie of Southern hemisphere mapped images [select dates when the s/c is in the south (Nov.- Feb.)]
Parameter.Caveats: * Reported albedo is a ratio of observed cloud albedo normalized by earth's albedo. This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_FILTER_FLAG with the following input parameters: ALBEDO, HEMISPHERE.

Parameter.Name: Hemisphere
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Hemipshere: S = southern hemisphere, N = northern hemisphere [NO PLOT, but can be listed, etc.]

Parameter.Name: CenterLon
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Center longitude of map projection, NOT data. Used for orienting the data horizontally.

Parameter.Name: image start
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: GPS start time of first image in orbit (microseconds from 0000 UT on 6 Jan 1980) / [15], range: 9.6206507e14 to 9.6214616e14

Parameter.Name: Kmperpix
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Linear dimension of square pixel occupying area of CIPS resolution element.

Parameter.Name: BBox
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: {x, y} Bounding Box: Bottom-Left and Top-Right indices of the smallest rectangle which both circumscribes a set of cells on a grid and is parallel to the grid axes.

Parameter.Name: DEPENDENT2AVERSION
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Version of lower level 2 data used to produce this data set. One value per orbit (Each orbit forms a petal in the daisy.

Parameter.Name: Petalstart
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: GPS start time of each orbit (microseconds from 0000 UT on 6 Jan 1980) / [15], range: 9.6206507e14 to 9.6214616e14

Parameter.Name: Albedo
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: An array containing the orbit number for each petal in daisy.

Parameter.Name: Quality (DAILY DATA)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch_cdf
Parameter.Description: Indicator of data quality. Measurements with values equal to or less than the value of Quality_Flags are included in the daisy. In v4.20 the QF is determined only by NLayers as follows: NLayers > 5, QF=0. NLayers = 4 or 5, QF=1. NLayers < 4, QF=2. / 0
Parameter.Units: If NLayers > 5: QF=0, NLayers = 4 or 5: QF=1 NLayers < 4: QF=2
